reviewText: This movie is great, what I mean by that is that it has the usual bad translation, corny and predictable story line.  Awsome sound effects and fight scenes.  the remastering is pretty fair.

I love this movie!!!
Thank Y'all So Much!!!
Nice classic Kung action, just not my favorite from that era.
Seen this flick many years ago, the martial arts, and story was fantastic!

If you like David Chiang you will love him in this movie. He play a monk who was chosen to build shaolin back to its original state after its been burnt down. It's a good movie so you will enjoy it if you are an fan.

Excellent movie and DVD was the remastered version from red sun in full letterbox glory.  Also had the English dub available for anyone interested.  I've always loved this movie so glad to find a quality copy worthy of my collection.

Visually the movie is crisp and clean. This is one of the first (if only) David Chiang as a monk that I know of with Lo Lieh as Pai Mei. The story is good and the fight scenes are good for the genre with David Chiang putting on a good performance. I would highly recommend this movie to round out any Lo Lieh/ Pai Mei collection.
5.1 sound, awesome picture quality.david chiang is amazing as monk chi san.lo lieh, lilly li, what more could you ask for?
What ever you do ...don't get this copy. I have a copy thats remastered by red sun. If it doesn't say remastered then it's not..
